name: INS-019: Change opacity of paragraph element and verify the opacity value

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Create a new PAGE page from blank
Click on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: catalog--catalog-list--paragraph

steps.name: Drag from element By.className: Catalog-Image to element By.cssSelector: iframe
Change opacity and verify selected element has the correct opacity

Get attribute aria-valuenow of element By.id: inspector--opacity--slider

Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Verify element By.xpath: //*[@data-pf-id='c4df868d-75e3-4580-a955-94054ad71516'] with attribute opacity has value is 0.2
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Change opacity and verify selected element has the correct opacity
Get attribute aria-selected of element By.id: styling
Clear and Fill text on text box
Clear text in text box word by word
